events.message: I filed a claim today after my car was involved in a collision on the highway. The accident caused significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the review of the incident report and preliminary photos provided by the claimant.
An insurance agent has been assigned to this case to guide the customer through the claims process and address any concerns they might have.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by our team, and the customer has been informed that we are starting the investigation promptly.
We requested additional documents including a police report, witness statements, and repair estimates to proceed with a thorough evaluation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed photographs of the vehicle damage.
The investigation into the circumstances of the collision and the damages claimed has officially commenced.
The investigation concluded, confirming that the accident was caused by another driverâ€™s negligence and the damages reported are consistent.
A settlement proposal has been made to cover the full cost of repairs to the vehicle as well as towing and rental expenses.
The customer responded positively, expressing gratitude for the prompt and fair handling of their auto accident claim.
The claim has been officially approved, confirming that the settlement proposal is accepted and all criteria have been met.
Payment has been issued to cover repair costs and related expenses, ensuring the customer can proceed with vehicle restoration.
The claim has been closed following full payment and resolution, with the customer notified of the closure and final documentation.
All case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
